name: Avoid having the assignment to "$this" (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all classes containing assignements to '$this'.
output:
"This report lists all the Classes containing assignements to '$this'.

This QR provides the following information:
Class  full name."
rationale: In PHP the assignment to $this is used to unset the object, or it is a typographical error. Unsetting an object is not really necessary for performance reasons. Removing all variables that point to the object to be unset will have the same result. It is also important to remember to do so because the result will be a fatal error. As such, in PHP5 mode, this kind of practice could provoke a failure.
remediation: Modify the source code and do not assign to '$this'.
